title: Age.of.Empires.1.complete.v1.0c.REPACK.FIXED-vol1
description:
Age.of.Empires.1.complete.v1.0c.REPACK.FIXED-vol1

The FIXED release adds the color fix. Simply start the game with the "color fix" shortcuts, if you have the water color bug.

Age of Empires 1 and its expansion "The Road of Rome", patched to v1.0c and 1.0a, which are the final versions.

The folder "docs" contains civ trees/docs/manual PDFs. The annoying Win95 error with the original disc of RoR does not occur with this installer.


1. Mount or unpack .iso
2. Install
3. Play	

Tested on Windows 7 x64.
